text: Las Bela was princely state in British India (now Pakistan) which existed until 1955. Later it was merged with the Karachi-Bela Division. The state was founded by Sindhi Jamote people in 1742 by Jam Ali Khan Koreja I. Image:Flag of the State of Las Bela.svg Image:Las Bela Map.gif == References == Category:Former subdivisions of Pakistan Category:Pakistani princely states
title: Las Bela (princely state)
